description:
After completing this learning you should have a good understanding of the challenges that a SAP Project Manager faces and the Knowledge and Tools for the Project Manager for a successful outcome of your SAP project.

What our students are saying
"After following these videos from start to finish, I feel like I participated in an SAP full lifecycle implementation project; an excellent presentation and the presenter seems fully knowledgeable of the product and the business process. I would like to see more presentation from him".Diallo Hassimiou

"I just started this course, but from what I have covered so far, am on my way to becoming a 5 star SAP PM".Laurson Riviere

"Excellent course. I enjoy the way the course was organize and the instructors clarity". Angel M. Romero Jr.

"This course really motivated me to become a SAP Project Manager and I hope soon to be able to put the knowledge to use in my first project". Barbara Golder

The Course is structured into the following areas to follow the phases and key milestones of a SAP Project:

  • Introduction to SAP Projects and SAP Project Management tools
  • The Accelerated SAP (ASAP®) Methodology V8
  • Project Preparations & SAP Business Blueprint design
  • SAP Realization and Final Preparation phases of your
  • Project “Go-Live”, Roll-out and Support

The course provides more than:

  • 40+ Video lessons
  • 15+ Templates, Guidelines, Tools for download
  • Quizzes to test your knowledge

Everyone involved in SAP projects as either a Consultant, Team lead or as Project Manager will benefit for the course

The course will provide detailed training in how to successfully manage SAP projects, but course is not a preparation course for taking the SAP Associate Project Manager certification (C_PM_71)
title: How to become a successful SAP Project Manager
